page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: The school has{2 mobile class rooms with the{main building}having 3 rooms, A{computer}room, a{library/ staff}room and a Junior class room. There are 79 children divided between{3 teachers. School is from{9.00 a.m.to 3.30.p.m. with 1 hour for either school or packed lunch. School subjects are reading, writing, drawing, maths, sewing, games and project work. {Gala Day On the 4th of July we had a Gala day with lots of races & games.After that there were some stalls with toys,books games & plants.There was one stall with tea,orange & crisps.The children were divided into 8 teams & the winners were Vampires Revenge the captain was Lynsey Walker.
